name: Mini Putt
description:
Mini Putt is a multiplayer minigolf game for you and your friends! Enjoy our carefully crafted maps and maps made by our awesome community using our advanced map editor! No, we will not charge for new maps, outfits, hats or anything!

Features


16 Player Multiplayer
Invite up to 16 of your friends into a game of Mini Putt to show of your skills.

Ball Customisations
Unlock balls, faces, hats and trails to stand out from the other putters.



Advanced Map Editor
Create your own awesome maps and share them with other putters.
  • Terrain Editor
  • 100s of unique models
  • Awesome model components



Free DLC
We will not charge for any additional content that we add to Mini Putt, we want the game to be as fun as possible for everyone!
